Past mistakes teach that buying pure momentum without respecting valuation can lead to painful drawdowns. The company's 'insurmountable multi-year lead in AI hardware and software' and broadening TAM into enterprise AI, as per the original plan, overwhelmingly outweigh the transient competitive and technical headwinds raised.
